use_cases.case: The assembled genome of Bacillus atrophaeus NRRL NRS 213 (GCF_001584335) was returned as a result of a BLASTN against the NCBI RefSeq genome database and used to partially reconstruct a novel plasmid labeled pBatNRS213â€ .

The reconstructed plasmid pBatNRS213† from the assembled genome of Bacillus atrophaeus NRRL NRS 213 (GCF_001584335) was subjected to further sequencing and annotation to determine if the original contig represents the complete plasmid pBatNRS213 sequence.
